sn12.10:1.1: “Pubbeva me, bhikkhave, sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi:
sn12.10:1.2: ‘kicchaṁ vatāyaṁ loko āpanno jāyati ca jīyati ca mīyati ca cavati ca upapajjati ca.
sn12.10:1.3: Atha ca panimassa dukkhassa nissaraṇaṁ nappajānāti jarāmaraṇassa.
sn12.10:1.4: Kudāssu nāma imassa dukkhassa nissaraṇaṁ paññāyissati jarāmaraṇassā’ti?
sn12.10:2.2: ‘kimhi nu kho sati jarāmaraṇaṁ hoti, kiṁpaccayā jarāmaraṇan’ti?
sn12.10:2.3: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.10:2.4: ‘jātiyā kho sati jarāmaraṇaṁ hoti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇan’ti.
sn12.10:3.12: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.10:3.13: ‘avijjāya kho sati saṅkhārā honti, avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā’ti.
sn12.10:4.4: ‘Samudayo, samudayo’ti kho me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
sn12.10:5.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati jarāmaraṇaṁ na hoti, kissa nirodhā jarāmaraṇanirodho’ti?
sn12.10:5.3: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.10:5.4: ‘jātiyā kho asati jarāmaraṇaṁ na hoti, jātinirodhā jarāmaraṇanirodho’ti.
sn12.10:6.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati jāti na hoti …pe…
sn12.10:6.11: saṅkhārā na honti, kissa nirodhā saṅkhāranirodho’ti?
sn12.10:6.12: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.10:6.13: ‘avijjāya kho asati saṅkhārā na honti, avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodho’ti.
sn12.10:7.4: ‘Nirodho, nirodho’ti kho me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādī”ti.
